casebody.data:
R. W. LAUGHLIN v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE. No. 3275. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. March 25, 1946. Jerome E. Hemry, of Oklahoma City, Okl., for petitioner. Samuel O. Clark, Jr., Asst. Atty. Gen., and Sewall Key, Sp. Asst. to Atty. Gen., Department of Justice, for respondent.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petition to review dismissed on motion of petitioner.
